articles.title: Tickets for India's first-ever street circuit race, 'Indian Racing League' to be held at Hyderabad, out now - Telangana Today
articles.description: The regular passes can be bought for a single day and start from Rs 749, while the weekend pass is a two-day pass starts from Rs 1,249.

articles.title: Utter nonsense to keep India favourites for 2023 ODI World Cup: Ex-Eng captain - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Michael Vaughan, who advised India to 'swallow their pride and follow England' went on to the extent of saying keeping host India as the favourite for next year's ODI World Cup will be ‘utter nonsense’. | Cricket
